name: A Shadow Is Cast
description:
A Shadow Is Cast is a horror game that I (Joseph) am currently working on.  The Game will have a cool story that you slowly uncover throughout the game as you go through a series of objectives and obstacles. The first Demo is out now which is the prologue to my story, although very short hopefully you find it interesting. More demos will come out as I develop the game and date of release is uncertain, but when I know, so will you. Hope you like it!

!!! Screenshots are from development and may or may not be in any current version of the game available yet !!!
